content.p: stands for Object Oriented Opensource Middleware for Service Communication Introspection and Discovery.
has been implemented so far in C++, Java and Tcl. See the download page to obtain the desired release.
O3MiSCID is born in the PRIMA project from INRIA. It has been released as an open source project on the DATE.

is also known as:
Omiscid for short use (in APIs for example)
